[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@imhonglu/format](./format.md) &gt; [IPvFuture](./format.ipvfuture.md)

## IPvFuture class

The IPvFuture formatter based on RFC 3986.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class IPvFuture 
```

## Example


```ts
IPvFuture.parse("v1.something-text"); // { version: 1, address: "something-text" }
```
